title: Why can't i view the PROJECT: teaser?
body: whenever i try to load the page i just get the loading symbol but it stops halfway (picture shown) and doesnt load anymore, what do i do?

replies.body:
Same, I can't load mine either, it looks like it gets stuck at exactly the same spot as you have shown. 
I let it load for over 7 minutes and it still hasn't moved, I recently updated by Chrome about 4 days ago so I don't think it's the browser.
I play league at a 70 - 85 ping when no one is using the internet at my house.

Funnily enough i actually tried that..
but the clue was in the "i just get the loading symbol but it stops halfway" 
that sentence implies that just letting it load wasn't working.

Well let it load?:) It paused there ages for mine too. Maybe put some better bread in your toaster. Just teasing you. I'm no techie but you might have to update some things on ur pc or something? Who knows g

What Operating System are you using?
i.e. Macintosh, Windows, Linux etc.

I tried loading this page on my Macintosh and it didn't seem to work, it gets stuck similar to what you've shown.
When I opened up the page in Windows 8 it worked perfectly fine, if a little bit slow on the loading.
